issue.title: [Rust] Allow string array to be built from iterator of &str
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10476](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10476). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we support string arrays to be built from an iterator of `String`. This issue aims to support building a string array from an iterator of `&str`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10476?focusedCommentId=17227789) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8575
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8575>
